name: Duel Dice VS the Demons
description:
Mod of https://flowg.itch.io/duel-dice

For Ludum Dare 44, 4fun! https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/duel-dice-vs-the-demons

So Duel Dice is an online rogue-like strategy dueling game from a little more then a year ago. I thought creating a solo game 'mod' of it would be a fun small project to do for this JAM. The theme fit the Duel Dice brand a little too well. Even though I was working with my past game project that had a lot of polish in it, I ripped most of it out to make this teaser. So here it is!

To play:
Enter your name.
Customize your dice in the Fate Shop.
Drag 3 dice onto the board.
Drag dice into the vortex to re-roll.

The demon takes 10% or 3 Fate every round.
The demon will also offer you pacts to help you out.
Good luck!
